fields.description:
Performing database upgrade from 4.1.2 to 4.2 fails on CLC.  Steps were very basic to create:

1. installed 4.1.2 from packages using quick launch.  
2. update yum configuration to point to devel (baseurl=http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/tags/eucalyptus-devel/centos/6/x86_64/)
3. stop cloud/cc/ufs/nc
4. update packages according to docs.  
5.  start cloud (service eucalyptus-cloud start) on CLC

This results in the below output:

      "auth_statement"
